content: Explains how compound works, how interest rates are calculated
name: Compound - Internals

steps.content:
### Supply Rate
when `utilization <= supplyKink`: supply rate  =  interestRateBase + interestRateSlopeLow * utilization 

when `utilization > supplyKink`: supply rate  =  interestRateBase + interestRateSlopeLow * kink + interestRateSlopeHigh * (utilization - kink)

### Borrow Rate
when `utilization <= borrowKink`: interestRateBase + interestRateSlopeLow * utilization

when `utilization > borrowKink` : interestRateBase + interestRateSlopeLow * kink + interestRateSlopeHigh * (utilization - kink)
